Posts.Content: Hello Girly Girl! Positive attitude and keeping the faith. I finished chemo in September and the horror stories that I heard before starting chemo petrified me. Everyone handles chemo differently. After a couple of treatments you see a pattern. I will tell you that I never got sick from chemo and I never missed a day of work. The third day after chemo I was tired but I wasn’t going to let it get me. It really is all about keeping a positive attitude and keeping the faith. Good luck! Keep us posted.
Posts.Title: Scheduled First Chemo Appt. Today
